title: Space Craft: Season 2 Trailer
description: Would you choose to live on another planet if given the chance? How about living in space? In this season of Space Craft, follow along as Loren Grush investigates some of the ways people are preparing to live in space  from testing out habitats and growing food, to learning about the physiological challenges and medical trainings necessary to survive.    Catch up on Season 1 of Space Craft with Loren Grush here:   Subscribe:   Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Read More:  Community guidelines:   Subscribe to Verge Science on YouTube, a new home base for our explorations into the future of science:
transcript: - [Loren] I've been fascinated by space my whole life. And I get to report on it every day, but all my work is done from Earth. Well, mostly. Given the chance, I'd love to go to space, even to live there, but what would it take to do that? And what would it be like living on another planet? (upbeat music) - Well, we think about what is a day in the life of an astronaut gonna look like? What it takes to keep them alive as well as what work they're gonna do and science they're gonna perform while they're there. - [Loren] You really have to be careful with your footing. - If you have an acute episode and it's 20 minutes to wait for a response from the flight surgeon on the ground, you don't have that functionality. - [Woman] We need answers now. - [Man] You got to do it. - [Man] Okay, I'm in the process. - So especially when we go to Mars, we're gonna have to figure out if we want to use the Martian regolith as a medium to grow plants in. We're gonna have to convert that regolith into a soil, a usable soil. - This season follow along as I investigate some of the ways people are preparing to live in space, from testing out habitats and growing food to learning about the psychological challenges and medical trainings necessary to survive. This job always requires me to get into weird body suits. I'm Loren Grush, and this is Space Craft.
